column111:
comment:"Cools well and looks cool while doing so. A normal refrigerator consumes energy equal to about two fans. This inverter one should be equal to one fan.

Has a manual dial next to the light inside to adjust cooling strength ranging. Sides are black. The front is glass which has a slight hint of green(the color I got). 

Has glass shelves which can stand up to 100kg weight. Front has two height adjustable feet. Back does not have separate feet. Body is wide instead of being deep. 

Also
column112: do not place it on a wooden/plastic stand as the body touching the ground prevents from damage from electrical surges. Low voltage doesn't harm inverter appliances but high voltage can
